metadata.title: CVE-2017-11098 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When SWFTools 0.9.2 processes a crafted file in png2swf, it can lead to aSegmentation Violation in the png_load() function in lib/png.c.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
